title: Business Analyst
description:
TCS is Hiring!!

Job Role: Business Analyst

Experience:5+yrs

Location: Bangalore, Chennai

Job Description:

Requirements:

• The candidate must be a self-starter, who can work under general guidelines in a fast-spaced environment.

• Overall minimum of 3 to 4 years of experience in Banking Domain, wholesale banking product knowledge and experience preferred.

• Possess good proficiency in Data Model design with respect to conceptual, logical & physical models.

• Ability to clearly communicate complex technical ideas regardless of the technical capacity of the audience.

• Ability to understand business problems/needs and translate into sustainable data model design / solution.

• Good presentation, documentation skills, interpersonal skills, and communication skills

• Work closely with developers and testers to support the development and testing process.

• Collaborate with various teams and stakeholders to meet business needs.




Role Specific:

• Should have experience in working in Banking domain ; Sound understanding of Banking Regulations like Basel is value added.

• Proficient in SQL

• Responsible for capturing, elaborating business requirements & real-time analytics use cases in the journey, customer campaign and real-time analytics and translate them into user stories and functional design.

• Engage and Elicit business requirements from stakeholders in a challenging environment.

• Documenting the process/data flows & data mapping, processing, and validation rules for use cases

• Work with program/project managers, product owners, and other team members in providing clarity of requirements and how it relates to the business objectives.

Technical Skills:

- Techno Functional Business Analyst in Banking Domain

- Excellent Knowledge & Understanding Oracle & SQL.

- Add advantage of knowing Phyton/ Hive / ADO

- Flair for learning new tools & technology.
